metadata.name: UBIQ . sicyrma
metadata.description:
Do NFTs dream of Electric sheep?

UBIQ is a unique collection of ‘digital performance paintings’. 

Up to now performance art demanded the viewer to engage & to be physically present. Now, we have this very different online digital environment where we don't have direct engagement; the viewer is probably seeing the work from a mobile or a gallery in the Metaverse. 

UBIQ was created with the consideration of how performance art can transform in the digital art space to something that may be a derivative of what we knew performance to be. It explores ways to create New Forms of performance as ‘digital performance paintings’ in the NFT space.

Each work is a 1/1
and all are variations of a fictional character ‘ubiq’ inspired by novels of science fiction writer Philip K. Dick. The costume and set are of equal importance as the body and the movement. 


Created By @dancevatar 

music @elektroniki
performance @_gavgaav
camera @dancevatar & @anartist
salt lake, 34.600834, 32.955002

2022
